extension.description: This plugin allows searching for Community Builder users with Joomla search.

field.name: search_area
field.label: Area
field.description: Input Community Builder search area. Area lets users check a checkbox to search only that location.

field.name: search_fields
field.label: Fields
field.description: Select the fields to search on.

field.name: search_blocked
field.label: Blocked
field.description: Select if blocked users should also be searched. Note only moderators can access these users profile. Default is no.

field.name: search_banned
field.label: Banned
field.description: Select if banned users should also be searched. Note only moderators can access these users profile. Default is yes.

field.name: search_unapproved
field.label: Unapproved
field.description: Select if unapproved users should also be searched. Note only moderators can access these users profile. Default is no.

field.name: search_unconfirmed
field.label: Unconfirmed
field.description: Select if unconfirmed users should also be searched. Note only moderators can access these users profile. Default is no.

field.name: search_exclude
field.label: Exclude
field.description: Optionally input comma separated list of user ids to exclude from searching (e.g. 62,43,91).

field.name: result_title
field.label: Title
field.description: Input substitution supported result title. The title will link to the users profile and is displayed above the result text.

field.name: result_text
field.label: Text
field.description: Input substitution supported result text. This will display below the result title and should describe the users profile well.

field.name: result_limit
field.label: Limit
field.description: Input results limit to reduce query size. If left blank no limit is applied.

field.name: ordering_alpha
field.label: Alphabetical
field.description: Select the field to order by if ordering Alphabetical.
